'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}.

## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Notes

* Used in conjunction with the passive ability [Resonance](/resonance/). When triggered, all Resonance stacks on enemies in an AoE are cleared, and deal 15 [Raw Damage](/rawDamage/) each.
